The true Protestants watch-word, instructing all true Protestants what they ought to do in a peaceable way of opposition againt Popery, at this juncture of time. / By T.P. a friend to truth and peace. T. P., friend to truth and peace.
[2], 2 p.
Printed for H.B., London : anno 1679.
With marginal notes. Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
